about.title: About Me
about.summary: Board-certified Psychiatric Mental Health Nurse Practitioner providing comprehensive psychiatric evaluation and medication management across the lifespan. Completed rigorous graduate-level clinical training with emphasis on diagnostic formulation, psychopharmacology, risk assessment, and evidence-based psychotherapeutic approaches.
about.experience: Brings over a decade of nursing experience across inpatient psychiatry, outpatient behavioral health, hospice, acute care, and public health.
about.approach: Provides culturally responsive, trauma-informed psychiatric care in both English and Spanish.

education.title: Education
education.msn: Master of Science in Nursing – Psychiatric Mental Health Nurse Practitioner, Saint Louis University (December 2025, GPA: 3.72)
education.bsn: Bachelor of Science in Nursing, Northeastern State University (2021)
education.adn: Associate Degree in Nursing, Tulsa Community College (2016)

services.title: Services
services.evaluationsDesc: DSM-5-TR diagnostic assessments across the lifespan
services.medicationDesc: Initiation, titration, and monitoring of psychiatric medications
services.riskDesc: Suicide and violence risk assessments with safety planning
services.crisisDesc: Immediate support and intervention during mental health crises
services.bilingualDesc: Services available in English and Spanish
services.therapyDesc: CBT, Supportive Psychotherapy, Motivational Interviewing, Trauma-Informed Care, Psychoeducation
services.coordinationDesc: Collaboration with therapists and other healthcare providers

credentials.title: Credentials & Certifications
credentials.position: Current Position: Choose Courage Counseling Services, PLLC (2026–Present)

contact.title: Contact
contact.practice: Choose Courage Counseling Services, PLLC, Oklahoma
